db.description:
- Consult to customers about wine at the shop.
- Ensure that shelves are fully stocked and items are displayed neat and well-organized.
- Constantly check on the quality of the merchandise on display. All expired / near-expiry merchandise must be removed from the shelves. 
- Ensure that all signages/ shelf labels are clear, correct and properly displayed at the right places.
- Ensure that the store (shelves, wine cellar, etc…), are clean, free of dust. 
- Ensure that wine are kept in good conditions.
- Troubleshooting with customers about products and services.
- Organize wine tasting activities.
- Inform customer about the promotion, the latest information about the products, special programs for VIP customers.
- Make the stock count and sales forecast.
- Prepare the delivery on time for customers. 
- Other tasks as assigned by supervisor.
db.requirement:
- Vocational/College
- Experience as Wine Expert/Sales Assistant is an advantage.
- At least 2 year experience in F&B
- Good knowledge about wine/spirits.
- Good communication & customer services.
- Problem solving skills.
- Agility, detailed or thorough in stock checking.
- Persistence, dynamic, enthusiastic
- Shift rotation.
- Proficiency in English.
- Computer skills: Word, Excel, Powerpoint.
db.benefit:
- Full accordance with the provisions of the Labor Code of Vietnam (social insurance, health insurance, unemployment insurance, etc...)
- Opportunities to develop lucrative career in a professional environment: assessment process, promotion, etc…
- Trainings to improve the skills and expertise.
